name: Mindin.me

overview:
Manage your mind world.

Rule over your thoughts, ideas, tasks and all notes. Capture notable things and monitor by tagging. Any moment, everywhere! Both as personal and as business life. Easily and quickly.

Mindin is a personal applications platform on the internet. Itâ€™s about your thoughts, remembering things, to do list, important tasks, notable things. You will take every note that is very important for you. You will use tags for note categorisation. Your â€œmind archiveâ€œ is ready to hand for quick reach. Your internet connection is enough for reaching your mind world.

You will edit notes, send to anybody, change tags or types anytime. You know, you will have a long list. Donâ€™t panic! You will filter as days, weeks, tags, post types and some extra status. At first phase, the five function will be used. Notes, to do list, event-calender, network and bookmarking. Without surfing page to page. In a few steps and a few seconds.

You can register for beta test, now.
